rotate_lens.description: Rotate the lens to adjust the focus.

clean_lens.description: Clean the lens to ensure a clear image.

press_button.description: Press the button to take a picture.

clean_button.description: Clean the button to maintain its smooth operation.

slide_in_slider.description: Slide in the slider to zoom in.

slide_out_slider.description: Slide out the slider to zoom out.

clean_slider.description: Clean the slider to ensure ease of use.

clean_camera_body.description: Clean the camera body to maintain its appearance.

clean_whole_camera.description: Clean the entire camera including the lens, button, slider, and camera body.
